meanings.definition: A hollow part or piece for receiving and holding a corresponding part or piece.
meanings.sent1: I placed the bulb into the socketing on the lamp.
meanings.sent2: The socketing on the wall was perfect for the plug.
meanings.sent3: The socketing in the puzzle piece made it easy to connect.
meanings.sent4: The socketing of the key into the lock was smooth and satisfying.
meanings.sent5: The socketing of the phone charger into the outlet was quick and effortless.

meanings.definition: The act of fitting or fixing into a socket.
meanings.sent1: The socketing of the screw into the wall was secure.
meanings.sent2: He demonstrated the proper socketing of the cable into the port.
meanings.sent3: The socketing of the pieces together was like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her socketing of the pieces of the puzzle was quick and precise.
meanings.sent5: The socketing of the plug into the outlet was done with ease.

meanings.definition: To place in or fit with a socket.
meanings.sent1: She carefully socketed the plug into the outlet.
meanings.sent2: He socketed the new light bulb into the fixture.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic socketed the new part into place with skill.
meanings.sent4: The carpenter socketed the shelf onto the wall securely.
meanings.sent5: I socketed the key into the lock and turned it to open the door.
